Text:
This is no doubt an overlooked band of the Eighties, the first album in my mind was the best one.

The third one " trading secrets with the moon" had what I can remember some good tracks.
Please if you have that one put it up for us.
Paul
by the way.... you have made me and the wife very very happy with listing the first album, we cant stop playing it and singing along.
Found the third album on ebay so will give it a day or two and bid on it..
My favourite album all cathegories!! Thank you very much, it has been so damn hard to find this one...
